name: Nicer Gmail Compose Button
description:
Just a little modification I did of the compose new email button.

This is completely original, but I built to look reminiscent of the old one.

If you don't know how to use this, you'll need a plugin for your browser, then you can just click install. I like Stylus for all my custom stylesheets:
Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne?hl=en
Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/styl-us/

I'm not running any other client-side edits at the moment, so it should appear for you exactly as it does for me. However, as always, there's a chance it could completely break, especially with Google constantly changing the appearance of their sites. You can contact me on twitter @thetopmostdog to let me know of any issues, or compatibility clashes with other mods.

May include this edit in a collection of Gmail tweaks, later on.
